lead_paragraph: WIESEL--Elie. "Tzadik Haya Bedorotav-- Righteous Man of his Generation". I mourn my friend Elie, fellow Holocaust survivor, whose memories of Auschwitz, the graveyard of our families, we shared. Anchored to Torah, he emerged from the abyss to become a blessing and inspiration to the Jewish people, Israel and all of humanity. Elisabeth joins me in heartfelt condolences to Marion, his gifted Woman of Valor, his beloved son Elisha (Lynn) and grandchildren. Rabbi Arthur Schneier 1/3
